name: Trash Run (Alex_iz)
description:
My game is about a fish that swimming through time, but over the years there is more and more waste in the ocean, so more obstacles to avoid. 

This is my first game and i'm a student, so I did not manage to finish it on time. I still thinking that this is a good idea, so i gonna continue it even if the game jam is finished. So if you want to follow the progress of my game, fell free to check my github page.
